00012 #if !defined(APOXI_RTOS_WIN32)

00014 #endif
00015 
00016 // Hide WIN32 types
00017 
00018 #define BOOLEAN WIN32_BOOLEAN
00019 #define UCHAR   WIN32_UCHAR
00020 #define CHAR    WIN32_CHAR
00021 #define WCHAR   WIN32_WCHAR
00022 
00023 #define INT8    WIN32_INT8
00024 #define UINT8   WIN32_UINT8
00025 
00026 #define INT16   WIN32_INT16
00027 #define UINT16  WIN32_UINT16
00028 
00029 #define INT32   WIN32_INT32
00030 #define UINT32  WIN32_UINT32
00031 
00032 #define INT     WIN32_INT
00033 #define UINT    WIN32_UINT
00034 
00035 #define LONG    WIN32_LONG
00036 #define ULONG   WIN32_ULONG
00037 
00038 #define Action  WIN32_Action
00039 
00040 // our minimal system requirements: win nt 4.0 or win98
00041 // this ensures support of winsock2.h and IsDebuggerPresent()
00042 #define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0400
00043 #define _WIN32_WINDOWS 0x0410
00044 
00045 #if defined(_CPPUNWIND)
00046     #error Exception handling is enabled! APOXI requires exception handling to be disabled!
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #if (_MSC_VER >= 1300)
00050     #include <winsock2.h>
00051 #endif

00054 #include <basetsd.h>

00061 #include <io.h>

00063 #undef SERVICE_DISABLED     // disable WinNT define in winnt.h
00064 #undef TRANSPARENT          // disable WinNT define in wingdi.h (coming up with gfs v18.11)

00066 #undef O_WRONLY             // disable define in fcntl.h
00067 #undef O_RDWR               // disable define in fcntl.h
00068 #undef O_CREAT              // disable define in fcntl.h
00069 #undef O_TRUNC              // disable define in fcntl.h
